video.title: Spooksville
video.synopsis: In Spooksville, new kid Adam joins forces with two other teens to battle dark forces that have been plaguing the town for centuries.

episodes.synopsis: Soon after teen Adam moves with his dad to Springville, he learns from his geeky pals Sally and Watch why the seaside town is nicknamed Spooksville.
episodes.title: The Secret Path: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sally, Watch and Adam retrieve the spooky Secret Path map and, following its directions, find themselves transported back to a witch-filled 1771.
episodes.title: The Secret Path: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a young boy's strange disappearance, Adam, Watch and Sally encounter the confused ghost of the town's former lighthouse keeper.
episodes.title: The Howling Ghost

episodes.synopsis: With Sally and Watch, Adam traces the path of his long-lost mom to a sealed-off cave, where the trio becomes trapped with an otherworldly creature.
episodes.title: The Haunted Cave

episodes.synopsis: While trick-or-treating on Halloween, Adam, Sally and Watch witness a young boy being pulled into a deserted house by a shapeless force.
episodes.title: The Evil House

episodes.synopsis: When a nightmare keeps Sally awake, Adam and Watch check on her and see her being dragged into a closet by a "fear eater" who has been stalking her.
episodes.title: The Thing in the Closet

episodes.synopsis: After being clawed during a game of Dodge the Werewolf, Sally develops the fatal "Fire Inside" sickness, and Adam and Watch rush to find the antidote.
episodes.title: The Fire Inside

episodes.synopsis: While hiking on the Devil's Kneecap, Adam, Watch and Sally find a strange crystal that grants each of them one wish -- with terrible consequences.
episodes.title: The Wishing Stone

episodes.synopsis: A were-cat turns Sally into a kitten, and Ann, the feline's first victim, must concoct a spell to restore Sally before the change becomes permanent.
episodes.title: The Wicked Cat

episodes.synopsis: Watch receives an unexpected Christmas gift when a cute girl shows an interest in him, but her true motives -- and origins -- soon prove suspicious.
episodes.title: The No-Ones

episodes.synopsis: Ann casts a spell to reunite Adam with his missing mom, but instead transports the trio into a parallel dimension, where zombies and ninjas run amok.
episodes.title: The Dark Corner

episodes.synopsis: After Sally's parents join the snobbish Yacht Club, the trio investigates a series of disappearances connected to the club's resident crab monster.
episodes.title: Shell Shock

episodes.synopsis: When an evil blood-sucking plant threatens the students at Lizzie Borden High, Sally and Ann must bury the hatchet and join forces to stop it.
episodes.title: Flowers of Evil

episodes.synopsis: A school field trip at a logging camp takes a terrifying turn when a fog summoned by phone rolls in and students begin disappearing one by one.
episodes.title: Phone Fear

episodes.synopsis: When Watch's newly removed tonsils come to life and run away, Sally and Adam must corral them before they can attack and end up in the wrong hands.
episodes.title: Critical Care

episodes.synopsis: After the school blood drive is overtaken by an ancient vampire, Adam and an unlikely ally team up to save newly turned vampires Sally and Watch.
episodes.title: Blood Drive

episodes.synopsis: While on a camping trip with their dads, Adam and Watch are both terrified and perplexed by a large, furry beast who rampages through their campsite.
episodes.title: Fathers & Sons

episodes.synopsis: After her parents take off on an overnight trip, Sally discovers she is not alone, but trapped in her house with an army of vengeful lawn gnomes.
episodes.title: Gnome Alone

episodes.synopsis: Watch discovers and revives Frankenstein's monster, then uses him against a bully at school -- with unexpected consequences.
episodes.title: Oh Monster, My Monster

episodes.synopsis: Adam and Watch get stuck in a maze of memories in the mayor's head, and Sally must unravel the secret of his past before they become forever trapped.
episodes.title: Maze

episodes.synopsis: An encounter with the psychic Moorpark spooks Laurel. As he and his monster minions pursue her, she flees to the mountains with Ann and Adam.
episodes.title: Run

episodes.synopsis: When Adam wakes up from a nightmare, he finds his life has done a bizarre 180, and the stone he carries with him is at the center of the mystery.
episodes.title: Stone
